name: Ink Idiom
description:
Do you know your onions - inside out, forwards and backwards? Then Ink Idiom is the game for you!

Solve over 350 puzzles that give you a cryptic picture leading you in the direction of a wide array of popular English idioms and phrases. Ranging from the mundane and easy to deceptive and clever in the most lateral of ways, Ink Idiom will give your brain a workout - and maybe teach you an idiom or two in the process!

Ink Idiom can be played with a mouse and keyboard, or using mouse or touch controls.

Download the trial version for free to get a taster with Ink Idiom's first 16 puzzles, or pay $1 or more for access to all 350+ puzzles, with more potentially to be added in the future!
